_header: Katherine of Cata which is all to sayen
Subjects: Katherine of Alexandria, saint, life of
_description: Bokenham’s Life of St. Katherine — Prologue in rhyme royal, Life in couplets

BLAru327.First Lines:
KAteryne of Cata wych is Al to seyneAnd rima wych a ffal do
                    sygnyfy…
BLAru327.Last Lines:
…Wher þow lyuyst & regnyst as knowe alle menSeþ
                    ych man þat heryth þis legende. Amen
BLAru327.Attributed Author:
Translated into englys be a doctor of dyuyinte clepyd Osbern
                    Bokenam…Wrytyn in Cambryge by hys sonn ffrer Thomas Burgh (index, f.
                    193)
BLAru327.Attributed Title:
The prologue in to seynt kateryns lyf (rubric, f. 115v) The lyf
                    of seynt Kateryne (index, f. 193)
